name: Il Prescelto della Storia
description:
**Early version of the game. Full game release date is 23/6/2021**

In a replica of the Colosseo built in a faraway island, an experiment is bringing to life iconic statues that are then forced to fight endlessly.

In this game you play as one of those statues and your objective is simple: survive the hordes of Sand Gladiators that chase you.
